document.full_text: the boston bruins clinched a playoff berth with a 2-1 away win over the philadelphia flyers at the wells fargo center on sunday.
document.title: bruins clinch playoff spot with 2-1 win over flyers
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins clinched a playoff berth with a 2-1 away win over the philadelphia flyers at the wells fargo center on sunday.
